idea:
ARIIS.ai is a virtual try-on platform that enables apparel and accessories retailers to provide their customers with a better buying experience. 

ARIIS (Augmented Reality Intelligence Solutions) was formed with a vision where AR will revolutionize the way we shop by bridging the gap between digital and physical worlds. A radical store re-invention will offer retailers new ways to increase convenience and personalisation, and consumers the unique opportunity to experience re-envisioned shops.
name: ARIIS.ai
